resources.string: An app for smartwatches that brings prayers to you, designed to be accessible, convenient, and beautifully crafted just for you. \n\nCredit: he.wikisource.org
In memory of those killed in the October 7th terror attack, to the merit of the return of the hostages, and to the success of the IDF and Am Israel. May their memory be a blessing.
Developed by Yehuda By, a front-end developer from Israel. Visit my website at https://yeudaby.com to learn more about my work.
